bike.description: 100% Cro-Mo 21" TT frame, double butted TT/DT, MID BB, tig welded, externally relieved integrated head tube, forged 3D drop outs with integrated chain tensioners

components.description: Butted Cro-Mo, 1 1/8" threadless, heat treated Cro-Mo 1pc CNC steerer, butted 1.8-1.2mm Cro-Mo 1 1/4" blades, 6mm dropouts for 14mm axle w/ lateral gussets
FSA Impact, integrated 1 1/8" threadless
Fuse SL, forged alloy, 2pc moto-style clamp, top load, 50mm extension, 1 1/8" A-Head
Cro-Mo 2pc, 620mm width, 195mm rise, 11 degree back, 6 degree up sweep
Fuse Micro Flange w/ CNC bar ends
Tektro FX-950, cartridge bearing pivots, CNC cut 15mm offset arms, Koolstop multi compound cartridge pads
Tektro XL-950, cartridge bearing pivot, forged lever w/ 2pc clamp, 15mm cable pull
Odyssey 1/2"x1/8"x10t CNC'd, 2x cartridge bearing cog driver (integrated w/ hub)
KMC KOOL, K-710 SL, 1/2" x 1/8"
Fuse SL 2pc, heat treated tubular Sanko Cro-Mo arms w/ hollow 19mm heat treated Cro-Mo spindle
Fuse SL, CNC'd 28t w/ patented Wave Interface for Kool chain
Fuse SL MID, cartridge bearing, alloy cone spacers for 2pc crank w/ 19mm spindle
Specialized Lo-Pro Mag II, heat treated 9/16" Cro-Mo spindle, sealed cartridge bearings and magnesium body
SUN Street Lite, DW w/ eyelets (Chrome plated rear only)
Specialized Fuse SL, 36h, sealed cartridge bearing, hollow 14mm axle
Specialized Fuse SL cassette, 36h, sealed 4x cartridge bearing, 10t cassette w/ hollow 14mm axle
2.0mm (14g) stainless
Specialized Rhythm Pro, 20x2.1", DC, 60TPI, aramid bead
Specialized Compound Pro, 26x2.0", DC, 60TPI, aramid bead
Specialized schraeder valve
Specialized Fuse SL w/ hollow 9mm Cro-Mo rails, Aramid nose/tail and non slip sides
Specialized Fuse SL, dual bolt, 30.9mm
CNC'd alloy, single bolt
Owners manual, chainguard, reflectors, 2x heat treated steel axle pegs w/ anti-spin hardware
